Player.description: A KCMC player. Standard work job with no downsides. **Recommended for new players.**

Pacifist.description: A pacifist role. They gain a bonus `-50% Wealth Power` perk and can never lose their job.

Tennis.description: A professional tennis player both playing nationals and teaching other players.

Banker.description: Bankers help regulate the bank economy and they also take extra for themselves!

Police.description: A policeman, catching thiefs. They are less likely to be robbed (`+3 Rob Defense Levels`).

Robber.description: A thief. They are more likely to succeed in their robberies (`+2 Rob Attack Levels`).

Student.description: A student. Gain access to the `questions` command.

Gambler.description:
Gamblers gamble all their money to lose... but it seems like they are cheating sometimes!
Gamblers get the following perks:
* In CG, gain 5% more for >2x multiplier and 10% more for >3x
* Lotteries give 5% more
* Last CG multiplier influences next work gained (up to 10x multiplier). Minimum 10 Credit bet.
